name: The Werewolf Ninja
description:
Cursed into the form of a beast you must climb to the summit of  Mount Gaahna in order to break the spell. You will need to use your cunning, skill and a little bit of luck to  navigate your way up the mountain. 

Solve the puzzle and discover why you became The Werewolf Ninja. 

This game is still a work in progress so only the first 10
levels are available with plenty more in development, including 
updates and expansion packs planned. 

Note: If you find a level has been jammed by enemy forces you can
reset the level by going back up and down the stairs.
